CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 13, 1957, pg. 16, reads: "Gilbert's Barber Shop, located at 2158 Centre Avenue, is another evidence of business development in Hill District. The shop boasts the latest equipment, is air conditioned and featured courteous service.  In the picture, left to right, are Ephriaim [Ephraim] Wolfolk, Burnette E. Anderson, Louis Gilbert, Prop., and Oley Cosby."
TitMainTitle: Barbers Ephraim Wolfolk, Burnette E. Anderson, Louis Gilbert, and Oley Cosby standing in Gilbert's Barber Shop, 2158 Centre Avenue, Hill District
